Procedures (melting temperature: 950degC: Melt the glass in ambient air for 2 h
Bubble the melt with dry oxygen gas for 2 h
Bubble the melt with mixture of dry oxygen gas and CCl4 for 2 h
Bubble the melt with mixture of dry oxygen gas and CCl4 for 30 min, and then bubble with dry oxygen gas for 90 min
Bubble the melt with mixture of dry oxygen gas and CCl4 for 30 min, and kept in air for 90 min
